definition[0]: to tell someone legally that they must leave the house they are living in
example[1]: They refused to leave and were forcibly evicted  (=evicted by force).
example[2]: They were unable to pay the rent, and were evicted from their home.
definition[1]: to legally force someone to leave the house they are living in or land they are living on
example[3]: They were evicted from their home for not paying the rent.
